entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
